name: Block King Mania
description:
Block King Mania is very interesting Itíll take you back to the childhood with very nice graphics design for Brick Classic game .
Block King Mania gets all the charm of the puzzle game simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody. Itís very helpful for improving your memory and your reflections
Brain games like this one train concentration, reaction time, and spatial orientation skills Please try to stack all blocks and achieve the highest score
Have a good time with brick puzzle game. Block King Mania will never disappoint you!
FEATURES :
- Easy to learn and play
- Save game
- Support leaderboard


HOW TO PLAY :
- slide right , left and down to move blocks

Inspired by block puzzle classic, it is a simple, fun and suitable to everybody.
Now, try it and i'm sure you will like this Block King Mania .
